content: f104 nina hat by fairmount fibers design team all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 6/7/18 © fairmount fibers ltd 2018 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 1 of 2 f104 size instructions adult medium 16 circumference stretches to 24 9 deep co 50 sts join being careful not to twist and pm to show beg of round materials manos del uruguay franca 100% superwash merino rnds 1-4 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round wool approx 114 yds/150g 1 skein shown in f5000 cincuenta round 5 *p1 k1 repeat from * to end of round round 6 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round us11 / 8mm ndl 16 circular and dpn or size to obtain gauge round 7 repeat round 5 stitch marker tapestry needle rnds 8-28 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round gauge shape crown change to dpn when necessary 13 sts = 4 / 10cm over 1x1 rib relaxed round 1 *k1 p1 k1 s2sp k1 p1 twice repeat from * to end of abbreviations round 40 sts beg beginning rnds 2 4 and 6 work sts as they appear co cast on round 3 *k1 p1 s2sp p1 k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round 30 dpn double-pointed needle s sts k knit round 5 *k1 s2sp k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round 20 sts ndl needle round 7 *s2sp p1 repeat from * to end of round 10 sts p purl pm place marker cut yarn thread through remaining sts and pull tight repeat repeat round s round s make 3 pompom and attach at top s2sp slip 2 sts together as if to knit together slip next st insert tip of left needle back into all 3 sts and k3tog weave in ends st s stitch es all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 6/7/18 © fairmount fibers ltd 2018 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 2 of 2
